name: Learning Management System (MERN Stack)
desc: Developed a feature-rich Online Learning Management System using the MERN stack during my internship. The system includes user authentication, course management, OTP-based email verification, and functionalities for students and teachers.

name: Sundown Studio UI Clone
desc: This project incorporates advanced animations with GSAP, smooth scrolling effects with Locomotive Scroll, and interactive carousels using Swiper, highlighting my expertise in creating dynamic and visually engaging web experiences.

name: Sidcup Family Golf Website UI Clone
desc: This project features smooth animations implemented with GSAP and an interactive layout designed with Vanilla Tile.js, showcasing my front-end development and design skills.

name: Ochi.design UI Clone in React
desc: This React-based website showcasing modern design and interactivity. The project leverages Framer Motion for smooth animations and transitions, along with Locomotive Scroll for advanced scrolling effects.
